title: Controlled Access Gates, Covered Assigned Parking, Vanity
posting_body: ['Evoq Apartments encompasses the best of the Las Vegas Strip all in one convenient, modern, and central location.', 'Enjoy a storied neighborhood, engaging culture, and unique living accommodations in an unbeatable location just a block from the most luxurious Hotels and Casinos in the World.', '-Porches or Balconies', '-Controlled Access Gates', '-Entertainers', 'Clubhouse with TV Area, Modern Community kitchen, Billiards, Baby Grand Piano', '-On-Site Courtesy Patrol', '-Wet Bar', '-Stainless Steel Refrigerator', '-Air Conditioning', '-Three Resort-Style Pools, Including Spa, Cabanas, and Fire Pit', '-Stainless Steel Multi-Cycle Dishwasher', '-Reduced Sound Assembly Homes', '-Covered Assigned Parking', '-Business Center with Complimentary WiFi, Computers, and Brainstorming Room', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
